rules_text:
When this land enters, sacrifice it. Search your library for a basic Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{2}{U}{U}{R}{R}, Discard Meteoric Facade: It deals 3 damage to any target. Draw two cards, then discard a card.
notes:
!tapped

With all scarcity ended, all ills cured, the Weft’s users were free to devote themselves to play and excess.



if uncommon: Meteoric Facade
